subject: Music
Basketball
Traffic Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: The news that Mookie Blaylock, a former N.B.A. point guard, was involved in a car accident near Atlanta hit the members of Pearl Jam like a tragedy in the family.
snippet: The news that Mookie Blaylock, a former N.B.A. point guard, was involved in a car accident near Atlanta hit the members of Pearl Jam like a tragedy in the family.
